translation.es: Fue una gran revelación.

translation.en: It was really, really at the top at that point of time.
translation.es: Una de las más impactantes de la época.

translation.en: The icon for the country.
translation.es: El ícono del país.

translation.en: And any allegation against him
translation.es: El público indio era incapaz de aceptar

translation.en: could not be palatable to the Indian public.
translation.es: una denuncia en su contra.

translation.en: Could Mukesh Gupta bribe somebody like Mohammed Azharuddin?
translation.es: ¿Podría Mukesh Gupta sobornara alguien como Mohammed Azharuddin?

translation.en: I felt the pressure to find out what is the truth.
translation.es: CAPITÁN DE 1990 A 1999 Sentí la presión por descubrir la verdad.

translation.en: -[man in Hindi] Does the color look right? -It's fabulous.
translation.es: - ¿Este color queda bien?- Es maravilloso.

translation.en: [woman] The color is lovely, but it's not jittering, right?
translation.es: El color es lindo,pero no resalta mucho, ¿no?

translation.en: It's a summer color.
translation.es: Color de verano.

translation.en: Had I worn a dark one, it'd have been awful in this heat.
translation.es: Uno oscuro sería terrible con este clima.

translation.en: [in English] Azhar was never a communicative person.
translation.es: Azhar nunca fue una persona comunicativa.

translation.en: He's not somebody who can really tell you what he's thinking or feeling.
translation.es: No puedes descifrar lo que está pensando.

translation.en: -This shirt is nice, right? -Very nice.
translation.es: - Es una linda camisa, ¿no?- Sí.

translation.en: I didn't wear a dark-colored shirt…
translation.es: No usé una oscura.

translation.en: [in Hindi] But I hope it's not jittering.
translation.es: - ¿Está bien?- Espero que salga bien.

translation.en: [in English] Reticent, reluctant, very nervous.
translation.es: Reservado, reticente, nervioso.

translation.en: When was the last time you cried?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo lloraste por última vez?

translation.en: -Uh, cried? -Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Llorar?- Sí.

translation.en: -I don't think I cry. -You don't cry?
translation.es: - No lloro.- ¿No lloras?

translation.en: I hardly cry.
translation.es: Muy poco.

translation.en: All that would disappear when he stepped on the ground.
translation.es: Pero eso se desvanecía cuando jugaba.

translation.en: -[commentator] Lovely shot. -[crowd cheering]
translation.es: Gran golpe.

translation.en: What timing, what grace, what beauty.
translation.es: Era asertivo, tenía gracia.Era un deleite.

translation.en: [commentator] And again…
translation.es: Otra vez…

translation.en: And then these wrists…
translation.es: Y sus muñecas

translation.en: It was like a slap on the ego of the bowler.
translation.es: parecían golpear el ego del lanzador.

translation.en: [commentator] Azharuddin is only dealing in fours.
translation.es: Anota de a cuatro carreras a la vez.

translation.en: As if God made Azhar's wrists on a very leisurely afternoon,
translation.es: Como si Dios hubiera talladosus muñecas en una tarde de ocio

translation.en: carving them to perfection.
translation.es: hasta alcanzar la perfección.

translation.en: [commentator] There it is, a thoroughly deserved century for Mohammed Azharuddin.
translation.es: Mohammed Azharuddin alcanzólas bien merecidas 100 carreras.

translation.en: [Karri] I remember when he made a century on his debut,
translation.es: Anotó 100 carreras en su primer juego.

translation.en: then a second test and a second century.
translation.es: En el siguiente, anotó otras 100.

translation.en: And then a third century.
translation.es: Y 100 más en el tercero.

translation.en: Unbelievable. Unbelievable.
translation.es: Fue increíble.

translation.en: He's a hero for the entire nation.
translation.es: Era un héroe nacional.

translation.en: I was, uh, 14 when Azhar came back after creating the world record.
translation.es: Yo tenía 14 añoscuando Azhar creó el récord mundial. EXJUGADOR DE CRÍQUET

translation.en: It was huge. It was massive.
translation.es: Fue enorme. Fue multitudinario.

translation.en: The whole Hyderabad was there, greeting him.
translation.es: Todo Hyderabad estaba allí.

translation.en: You are ours now. You're the son of Hyderabad.
translation.es: "Eres parte de nosotros.Eres un hijo de Hyderabad".

translation.en: I told myself, one day,
translation.es: Me dije que algún día

translation.en: it will be me also on that podium.
translation.es: yo también subiría al podio.

translation.en: [Sawani] Mohammed Azharuddin is somebody who brought laurels to the country.
translation.es: Mohammed Azharuddinle trajo muchas victorias al país.

translation.en: Why are you filming? I'm telling you no.
translation.es: ¿Por qué filmas? Te dije que no.

translation.en: [in Hindi] Now go blow it up on the television.
translation.es: Vete a publicarlo en televisión.

translation.en: [in English] But as we dug further into this investigation,
translation.es: Pero al profundizar la investigación,

translation.en: we found there were, you know, some things to be looked into.
translation.es: descubrimos más cosas que inspeccionar.

translation.en: [in Hindi] There is no need to film. Why are you still filming it?
translation.es: No hay nada que ver.Ya te dije. ¿Por qué continuas filmando?

translation.en: [Tejpal, in English] During the Fallen Heroes investigation,
translation.es: Azhar seguía apareciendoen la investigación

translation.en: Azhar's name keeps cropping up.
translation.es: para Fallen Heroes.

translation.en: [in English] A lot of stories was about Azhar's making a quick deal
translation.es: Había muchos rumoresde que Azhar negociaba

translation.en: of 10 lakhs here, 20 lakhs here,
translation.es: diez lakhs por aquí, 20 por allá,

translation.en: taking a watch from here, buying a Mercedes.
translation.es: aceptaba un reloj, compraba un auto.

translation.en: Those kind of deals, too many of them.
translation.es: Muchos negocios de esa clase.

translation.en: [in English] Other players, they felt he had more money than he should.
translation.es: Otros jugadores sentían que él teníamás dinero del que debería.

translation.en: [Sawani] He had cultivated expensive habits.
translation.es: Tenía gustos muy caros.

translation.en: Yeah, you are also a very stylish man. I've already seen… very nice shoes.
translation.es: Eres un hombre muy elegante.Noté tus zapatos, son muy lindos.

translation.en: -Louis Vuitton. Armani… -Louis Vuitton. Armani?
translation.es: - Louis Vuitton. Armani.- ¿Louis Vuitton, Armani?

translation.en: -And the watch? -Piaget.
translation.es: - ¿Y el reloj?- Es Piaget.

translation.en: [Sawani] He wanted very fancy watches.
translation.es: Quería relojes elegantes.

translation.en: He was going around in Mumbai
translation.es: Se codeaba con la clase alta

translation.en: in high circles.
translation.es: de Bombay.

translation.en: So, uh, obviously, all that needed money.
translation.es: Y, desde luego, eso cuesta dinero.

translation.en: [Kumar] M.K told me that he could trap Azhar
translation.es: M.K me dijo que podía atrapar a Azhar

translation.en: with relative amount of ease
translation.es: con relativa facilidad

translation.en: because by then, Azhar's lifestyle had become such
translation.es: porque el estilo de vidaque llevaba Azhar en ese entonces

translation.en: that he needed lots of money.
translation.es: requería de mucho dinero.

translation.en: [Sawani] Azhar mentioned to Ajay Sharma
translation.es: Azhar le dijo a Ajay Sharma

translation.en: that he was in need of some money
translation.es: que necesitaba dinero

translation.en: because his girlfriend was doing some fashion show.
translation.es: porque su noviaiba a hacer un desfile de modas.

translation.en: His requirement was around, I think, one crore of rupees,
translation.es: Creo que necesitaba un crore de rupias,

translation.en: which was a huge, huge amount at that point of time.
translation.es: lo cual erauna suma enorme en ese entonces.

translation.en: Ajay Sharma threw the bait.
translation.es: Ajay Sharma le dijo:

translation.en: "There is a person who could give you that sort of money."
translation.es: "Hay una personaque puede conseguirte esa suma".

translation.en: There was a meeting organized in Taj Palace Hotel in Delhi
translation.es: Se organizó una reuniónen el hotel Taj Palace en Delhi

translation.en: with Azharuddin and Mukesh Gupta.
translation.es: entre Azharuddin y Mukesh Gupta.

translation.en: Mukesh Gupta, being the clever guy he was,
translation.es: Gupta, siendo el hombre listo que era,

translation.en: offered to pay 50 lakh rupees on that same day,
translation.es: ofreció pagarle 50 lakhsde rupias ese mismo día

translation.en: and give him the rest of the money a little later.
translation.es: y darle lo demás más adelante.

translation.en: But it was kind of obviously clear M.K expected a lot from Azhar.
translation.es: Pero era obvio que M.Kesperaba mucho de Azhar.

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] To a bookie,
translation.es: Para un corredor,el capitán es el jugador más valioso.

translation.en: the captain is more important than any other player.
translation.es: Para un corredor,el capitán es el jugador más valioso. VOZ DE UN CORREDOR ANÓNIMO

translation.en: Because a captain has the most information.
translation.es: Porque el capitán tiene mucha información.

translation.en: If a bookie has a captain on his side, he makes the most money.
translation.es: Un corredor ganará más dineroteniendo al capitán de su lado.

translation.en: [Sawani, in English] As a captain, Azharuddin was able to bring in
translation.es: Como capitán, Azharuddin podía obligara los demás jugadores a hacer su voluntad.

translation.en: other team members to do his bidding.
translation.es: Azharuddin podía obligara los demás jugadores a hacer su voluntad.

translation.en: Get players to underperform and therefore lose the match.
translation.es: Podía obligarlos a jugar maly perder un partido.

translation.en: All these cricketers', you know, claim to fame
translation.es: La gloria de los jugadores de críquet

translation.en: is that they're playing for India. What an honor!
translation.es: es que juegan para la India.Un gran honor.

translation.en: And selling that honor? Shameful.
translation.es: Y vender ese honor es una vergüenza.

translation.en: It definitely needed to be met with an iron hand.
translation.es: Era necesario que hubiera consecuencias.

translation.en: [Kumar] M.K's revelations were the backbone of the CBI inquiry.
translation.es: La declaración de M.K fue el pilarde la investigación de la OCI.

translation.en: They recorded his statement
translation.es: Grabaron su declaración

translation.en: and they found supporting evidence.
translation.es: y hallaron evidencia que la respaldaba.

translation.en: [Sawani] We picked up all the call records of Mohammed Azharuddin
translation.es: Investigamos los registrosde llamadas de Azharuddin

translation.en: and they showed he had been talking to a number of bookies.
translation.es: y había habladocon muchos corredores de apuestas.

translation.en: Even talking to an underworld don.
translation.es: Y hasta con un líder del hampa.

translation.en: Mukesh Gupta told us
translation.es: Mukesh Gupta dijo

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin was running a locker in the Taj Palace Hotel
translation.es: que Azharuddin teníaun casillero en el hotel Taj Palace

translation.en: where people would come and deposit money.
translation.es: en donde le depositaban dinero.

translation.en: And this was corroborated by, you know, interviewing the hotel staff.
translation.es: Un encargado del hotel lo confirmó.

translation.en: He went shopping at the famous Harrods in England.
translation.es: Se fue de compras a Harrods en Inglaterra.

translation.en: All his bills were paid by somebody other than himself.
translation.es: Alguien más pagaba todas sus cuentas.

translation.en: We, of course, found out it was one of the bookies.
translation.es: Descubrimos que era uno de los corredores.

translation.en: After collecting all this evidence, we were ready to call in Azharuddin.
translation.es: Una vez recolectada la evidencia,nos preparamos para llamarlo.

translation.en: I had sat through the previous night
translation.es: Me desvelé toda la noche

translation.en: strategizing on, you know, the sequence of questioning.
translation.es: organizando una secuencia de preguntas.

translation.en: There was a little bit of, you know, anxiety there
translation.es: Estaba un poco ansioso.

translation.en: that let's not do anything wrong.
translation.es: No quería equivocarme.

translation.en: The captain of the team, he needs to be clean
translation.es: El capitán del equipodebe seguir las reglas.

translation.en: and if he is not, then he needs to be brought to book.
translation.es: Si no lo hace,tendrá que afrontar las consecuencias.

translation.en: [Kumar] When Mohammed Azharuddin came to the CBI headquarters,
translation.es: Cuando Azharuddinllegó al cuartel de la OCI,

translation.en: all hell broke loose.
translation.es: se desató el caos.

translation.en: [Krishnan] I clearly remember television crews, hordes of reporters.
translation.es: Recuerdo los equipos de televisión. Los periodistas decían:

translation.en: Could Azhar be involved in corrupting the game?
translation.es: "¿Azhar estaba involucradoen los fraudes?".

translation.en: Can't be. Azhar? No chance.
translation.es: "No puede ser. ¿Azhar? Imposible".

translation.en: That was the only thing which came into my mind.
translation.es: Eso era lo único en lo que podía pensar.

translation.en: [in Hindi] They are trying to finish his career.
translation.es: Quieren acabar con su carrera.

translation.en: They want to shut him down.
translation.es: Quieren acabar con él.

translation.en: [Sawani, in English] We have specific investigation rooms where you do interrogations.
translation.es: Tenemos salas especialespara los interrogatorios.

translation.en: All questioning would be across the table.
translation.es: Allí se hacen las preguntas.

translation.en: Most of the players who came into the CBI headquarters
translation.es: La mayoría de los jugadoresque fueron al cuartel

translation.en: had a scare on their face.
translation.es: parecían aterrados.

translation.en: But there were a category of players who knew what they were doing.
translation.es: Pero había un grupo que sabía qué hacer.

translation.en: I would put Mohammed Azharuddin in that category.
translation.es: Mohammed Azharuddin estaba en ese grupo.

translation.en: Azharuddin never answers a question straight.
translation.es: No contestóninguna pregunta de forma directa.

translation.en: Very rarely would he want to open his mouth.
translation.es: Habló muy poco.

translation.en: Perhaps he had been advised, less you speak, the better.
translation.es: Quizás es lo que le habían aconsejado.

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin actually stonewalled all queries.
translation.es: Azharuddin esquivó todas las preguntas.

translation.en: So, the CBI officials decided they must change tack.
translation.es: Así que los agentesdecidieron cambiar de estrategia.

translation.en: [Sawani] That's when we confronted him with the evidence we had.
translation.es: Lo confrontamoscon las pruebas que teníamos.

translation.en: We started listing his properties,
translation.es: Comenzamos a enumerar

translation.en: fancy cars, watches.
translation.es: sus propiedades, autos y relojes.

translation.en: We showed him his call records.
translation.es: Le mostramos su registro telefónico.

translation.en: Even the SIM that was being used by him
translation.es: Incluso estaba usando una tarjeta SIM

translation.en: was provided by one of the bookies.
translation.es: comprada por un corredor.

translation.en: The threat was there that we have M.K sitting in the next room.
translation.es: M.K estaba en la habitación de al lado.

translation.en: If you are denying this, should we bring him in?
translation.es: "¿Negarás todo? ¿Debo traerlo?".

translation.en: [Krishnan] That was the turning point.
translation.es: Ese fue el punto de inflexión.

translation.en: I think he broke down after that.
translation.es: Creo que eso lo quebró.

translation.en: [Sawani] And finally, he told us…
translation.es: Al final nos dijo:

translation.en: [in Hindi] "Yes, I fixed this match."
translation.es: "Sí, yo saboteé el partido".

translation.en: [in English] He was a broken man.
translation.es: Estaba destrozado.

translation.en: But I can't have any sympathy for a player who is tainted with match-fixing.
translation.es: Pero no podía compadecermede un deportista fraudulento.

translation.en: Letting down his nation.
translation.es: Defraudó a su país.

translation.en: Definitely no.
translation.es: Era imposible.

translation.en: People connect with the game of cricket personally.
translation.es: Las personas se involucranemocionalmente con el críquet.

translation.en: They would cry. They would laugh. They are so passionate about this game.
translation.es: Lloran, ríen. Sienten pasión por el juego.

translation.en: So, once we found
translation.es: Cuando descubrimos

translation.en: that there was something wrong with this guy
translation.es: que este hombre, quien era su ídolo,

translation.en: who was their icon,
translation.es: había obrado mal,

translation.en: they had every right to know.
translation.es: tenían derecho a saberlo.

translation.en: [reporter 1] In Delhi today, the minister for sport
translation.es: Hoy, en Delhi, el Ministro de Deportes

translation.en: unveiled the 75-page CBI report into match-fixing.
translation.es: reveló un informe de 75 páginasde la OCI sobre los fraudes.

translation.en: [reporter 2] The report shatters cricket's long-held reputation
translation.es: El informe destruyó la reputacióndel críquet como un juego de caballeros.

translation.en: for being a gentlemen's game.
translation.es: El informe destruyó la reputacióndel críquet como un juego de caballeros. FRAUDE DESENFRENADO

translation.en: [Sawani] The CBI came to a conclusion that match-fixing was rampant.
translation.es: La OCI concluyóque el fraude era desenfrenado.

translation.en: [woman] There should be a very real punishment.
translation.es: Deberían ser duramente castigados.

translation.en: I can say it's a heinous crime in my opinion.
translation.es: En mi opinión, es un crimen atroz.

translation.en: [Sawani] Besides naming our own,
translation.es: Además de los nuestros…

translation.en: he had named nine international players.
translation.es: …también nombróa nueve jugadores extranjeros.

translation.en: We also came to the conclusion that little was being done
translation.es: También concluimosque los directivos hicieron muy poco… LA JUNTA DESESTIMÓ EL PROBLEMA

translation.en: by the administrators to investigate.
translation.es: LA JUNTA DESESTIMÓ EL PROBLEMA …para investigar el asunto.

translation.en: Immediate impact was a big, big bang in the world of cricket.
translation.es: La consecuencia inmediata fueuna revolución en el mundo del críquet.

translation.en: When you hear that sport which you love and you care about
translation.es: Cuando te enterasque algo así pasa en un deporte

translation.en: and you're emotionally invested in,
translation.es: que amas con pasión,

translation.en: that this is happening, you get really angry.
translation.es: te enojas mucho.

translation.en: You just get so pissed off.
translation.es: Te enfureces.

translation.en: How dare they?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se atreven?

translation.en: What kind of people do this?
translation.es: ¿Quién haría algo así?

translation.en: But then you realize you're part of a whole community
translation.es: Luego entiendesque eres parte de la comunidad

translation.en: so busy worshipping them that they can't even see what they're doing.
translation.es: que los idolatrabaen lugar de observar qué pasaba.

translation.en: [crowd shouting in Hindi] Shut it! Whoever messes with us won't be spared.
translation.es: ¡Basta! Quien se metacon nosotros, la pagará.

translation.en: Whoever messes with us won't be spared.
translation.es: Quien se meta con nosotros, la pagará.

translation.en: [Tejpal, in English] The only truth about sport that fans care about
translation.es: Lo único que les importaa los fanáticos del deporte

translation.en: is that it has to be clean.
translation.es: es que sea un juego limpio.

translation.en: That competition is real. It's not fake, it's not a setup.
translation.es: Una verdadera competenciano debe ser actuada o montada.

translation.en: But the players broke that bone.
translation.es: Traicionaron la confianza.

translation.en: That's dangerous.
translation.es: Es peligroso.

translation.en: [in Hindi] Whoever messes with us won't be spared.
translation.es: Quien se meta con nosotros, la pagará.

translation.en: [in English] We wanted to look at,
translation.es: Queríamos determinar

translation.en: can we register a criminal case against anybody?
translation.es: si podíamos armarun caso penal contra alguien.

translation.en: So we took an opinion from three retired Supreme Court judges.
translation.es: Pedimos la opiniónde tres exjueces de la Corte Suprema.

translation.en: Although betting is illegal in India,
translation.es: Aunque apostar es ilegal en la India,

translation.en: unfortunately, match-fixing is not a criminal offense
translation.es: manipular partidos no es un delito penal.

translation.en: and so I was personally dissatisfied
translation.es: Me sentí decepcionado

translation.en: that we couldn't take criminal action against these guys.
translation.es: porque no pudimos condenarlos penalmente.

translation.en: [Ugra] I know many who stopped watching cricket after that.
translation.es: Conozco mucha genteque dejó de ver críquet.

translation.en: They just gave up. Didn't care.
translation.es: Se rindieron.

translation.en: So, the only way for Indian cricket to return to its equilibrium
translation.es: CASTIGAN A JUGADORES La única manera de restaurar el críquet

translation.en: was for the cricket board to take action against cricketers that were involved.
translation.es: era que la Junta tomara medidascontra los jugadores culpables.

translation.en: [reporter] The board is expected to deal severely with those implicated by the CBI report.
translation.es: Se espera que la Junta castiguea los implicados denunciados por la OCI.

translation.en: Cricketing world had to say to its fans,
translation.es: El mundo del críquet teníaque decirles a los fanáticos:

translation.en: "No, no, no. We'll not brook any nonsense."
translation.es: "No. No toleraremos esta conducta.

translation.en: "We will nip it in the bud."
translation.es: La arrancaremos de raíz".

translation.en: That was one of the reasons Azhar had to be made an example out of.
translation.es: Por eso había que marcarel ejemplo con Azhar.

translation.en: He had to be hanged publicly
translation.es: Debían castigarlo públicamente

translation.en: to reassure everybody that the cricketing story is fine
translation.es: para asegurar que el críquetvolvería a la normalidad

translation.en: and Azhar was an aberration.
translation.es: y que Azhar era una anomalía.

translation.en: [reporter] In the case of former captain Mohammed Azharuddin,
translation.es: En cuanto al excapitán,Mohammed Azharuddin,

translation.en: the finding is that he had a nexus with bookies like M.K Gupta
translation.es: se concluyó que tenía relacióncon corredores como M.K Gupta

translation.en: and that he was involved in match-fixing.
translation.es: y que participabaen la manipulación de partidos.

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin
translation.es: Se le prohíbe… PRESIDENTE DE LA JUNTA

translation.en: is debarred from playing any cricket matches
translation.es: …jugar cualquier partido de críquet

translation.en: conducted or authorized by ICC, BCCI for life.
translation.es: dirigido por la Junta o el Consejode Críquet Internacional de por vida.

translation.en: That's the saddest moment for Indian cricket.
translation.es: Fue muy triste para el críquet indio.

translation.en: Saddest moment for Indian cricket.
translation.es: El momento más triste en su historia.

translation.en: Azhar was like, "The person, the cricketer."
translation.es: Azhar era el referente del críquet.

translation.en: So playing under him was something great.
translation.es: Jugar con él era increíble.

translation.en: He lived by example, led by example.
translation.es: Predicaba con el ejemplo.

translation.en: He is a fighter. He didn't wanted to lose.
translation.es: Siempre fue un luchador. No quería perder.

translation.en: So, I never believed it.
translation.es: Jamás lo creí.

translation.en: I never believed it because Azhar couldn't do that.
translation.es: Jamás lo creí porque Azhar era incapaz.

translation.en: [Krishnan] Azhar was holed up in Hyderabad.
translation.es: Azhar se escondió en Hyderabad.

translation.en: He went into hiding.
translation.es: Desapareció.

translation.en: He was drawn into a shell.
translation.es: Se encerró en sí mismo.

translation.en: I was the only journalist that Azharuddin spoke to.
translation.es: Yo era el único periodistacon quien hablaba.

translation.en: That drive to Banjara was, uh, definitely nervous.
translation.es: Estaba nervioso cuando fui a Banjara.

translation.en: This is my first occasion meeting the man.
translation.es: Era la primera vez que lo vería.

translation.en: Would he be hostile?
translation.es: "¿Y si era violento?

translation.en: Would he develop cold feet?
translation.es: ¿Y si se arrepentía?".

translation.en: Those thoughts were playing on my mind.
translation.es: En eso pensaba.

translation.en: He asked me for lunch.
translation.es: Preguntó qué quería comer.

translation.en: He gave me chicken biryani.
translation.es: Ordenó pollo biryani para mí.

translation.en: And after which, uh, we sat down for the interview.
translation.es: Luego, comencé la entrevista.

translation.en: He said that it would be grossly unfair to put the blame on him squarely.
translation.es: Dijo que era muy injustoque él fuera el único culpable.

translation.en: He thought that the problem was even bigger.
translation.es: Pensaba que el problema era más grande.

translation.en: But the larger point he was trying to send out,
translation.es: Pero la idea que intentaba transmitir

translation.en: he kept protesting loudly that he was not involved,
translation.es: era que él nunca estuvo involucrado.

translation.en: that he was being made a scapegoat.
translation.es: Solo era un chivo expiatorio.

translation.en: He kept telling me that he would ride the storm…
translation.es: Me dijo que lucharía…

translation.en: and he would come out triumphant.
translation.es: …y que saldría victorioso.

translation.en: He actually thought
translation.es: En verdad creía

translation.en: the ban would be lifted if he successfully contested it.
translation.es: que revocarían la sanciónsi la disputaba legalmente.

translation.en: [Ramakanth Reddy] Being a lawyer is my passion, my love.
translation.es: Me apasiona ser abogado. Lo amo.

translation.en: I've been practicing law for the last 30 years.
translation.es: Ejerzo el derecho hace 30 años.

translation.en: Now, after the life ban was imposed,
translation.es: Cuando aplicaron la sanción,

translation.en: Azhar came to me and said,
translation.es: Azhar me dijo:

translation.en: [in Hindi] "Do something about it."
translation.es: "Haz algo".

translation.en: [in English] We have a CBI report which I read, reread and went on reading.
translation.es: Leí y releí el reporte de la OCI.

translation.en: Right from the beginning, everything was not in order.
translation.es: Desde el principio, nada estaba bien.

translation.en: See, the whole enquiry is based on hearsay.
translation.es: La investigación estaba basada en rumores. SOSPECHA QUE ESTÁ INVOLUCRADO

translation.en: What Ajay Sharma says, or what, uh, Manoj Prabhakar says.
translation.es: Sobre lo que dijo Ajay Sharmao lo que dijo Manoj Prabhakar.

translation.en: Or Mukesh Kumar Gupta.
translation.es: ESCUCHÓ O Mukesh Kumar Gupta.

translation.en: He had lot of endorsements and lakhs of rupees coming in.
translation.es: Él tenía muchos patrocinadoresy ganaba lakhs de rupias.

translation.en: He never had any assets
translation.es: Nunca tuvo bienes

translation.en: disproportionate to the known sources of income.
translation.es: desproporcionados a sus ingresos.

translation.en: So how can we give credence to this whole report?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se considera creíble este informe?

translation.en: There is not a single photograph, not a single video clipping, nothing.
translation.es: No tiene fotografías, videos o nada.

translation.en: It's very bad.
translation.es: Es muy malo.

translation.en: You are saying that you never did anything wrong.
translation.es: ¿Dices que nunca hiciste nada malo?

translation.en: It's complete rubbish, the match-fixing allegations.
translation.es: ¿Que las denuncias son mentira?

translation.en: -I think so. -But they said
translation.es: - Así es.- Pero dicen

translation.en: you admitted to some of the match-fixing stuff and…
translation.es: que admitiste participar en algunos…

translation.en: No. Because I have no chargesheet from any agency.
translation.es: No. Porque nadiepresentó cargos en mi contra.

translation.en: -So unless-- -But nor has your name been cleared.
translation.es: - A menos que…- Pero tampoco te exoneraron.

translation.en: Hopefully, it will be cleared.
translation.es: Espero que lo hagan.

translation.en: Azharuddin completely denied that he'd ever told the CBI
translation.es: Azharuddin negó por completo

translation.en: anything that was stated in the CBI report.
translation.es: sus declaraciones ante la OCI.

translation.en: But after we spoke to him,
translation.es: Pero después de hablar con él,

translation.en: the income tax authorities had raided his wife Sangeeta's house in Mumbai.
translation.es: las autoridades fiscales allanaron la casade su esposa Sangeeta en Bombay.

translation.en: They had found a fax from Azharuddin.
translation.es: Encontraron un fax de Azharuddin.

translation.en: Surprisingly, he went home and wrote everything that he had told us
translation.es: Parece que al volver a su casa,escribió todo lo que nos dijo

translation.en: and faxed them to his wife, Sangeeta Bijlani.
translation.es: y se lo envió a su esposa,Sangeeta Bijlani.

translation.en: Point-by-point,
translation.es: Punto por punto,

translation.en: he listed all the various things that he had told us.
translation.es: hizo una listade todas las cosas que nos dijo.

translation.en: For example, the introduction to M.K by Ajay Sharma.
translation.es: Por ejemplo, cuando Ajay Sharmale presentó a M.K.

translation.en: He had also written in the fax about his shopping spree in Harrods.
translation.es: ME VIERON COMPRANDO EN HARRODS También escribiósobre sus compras en Harrods.

translation.en: That bill had been paid by one of the bookies.
translation.es: Uno de sus corredorespagó por esas compras.

translation.en: So that corroborated that, you know,
translation.es: Eso lo confirmó.

translation.en: Azharuddin indeed had told all that things to us.
translation.es: Azharuddin había dicho todas esas cosas.

translation.en: He has been consistent all throughout
translation.es: Mantuvo su historia

translation.en: in saying that he was not involved in match-fixing,
translation.es: de que nunca participó en los fraudes.

translation.en: and any confession before a police officer is essentially under pressure.
translation.es: Y cualquier confesiónante la policía fue hecha bajo presión.

translation.en: We were quite certain that he was involved.
translation.es: Estábamos segurosde que había participado.

translation.en: Left no room for any doubt.
translation.es: No había duda.

translation.en: [interviewer] These allegations came and just ended your career abruptly.
translation.es: Estas denuncias llegarony acabaron con tu carrera.

translation.en: How did you cope with that? What did you do?
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo estás llevando? ¿Qué hiciste?

translation.en: Infinite patience. That's the only thing you can have.
translation.es: Con paciencia infinita.Es lo único que necesitas.

translation.en: I mean, if anybody possesses that, infinite patience,
translation.es: Siempre que uno tenga paciencia infinita,

translation.en: I think they'll always come out successful.
translation.es: saldrá victorioso.

translation.en: -Thank you for being on the couch with me. -My pleasure.
translation.es: - Gracias por hablar conmigo.- Fue un placer.

translation.en: Although not answering all the questions that honestly.
translation.es: Aunque no contestaste muchas preguntas.

translation.en: Maybe next time.
translation.es: La próxima.

translation.en: -We should have another couch with you. -Maybe next time…
translation.es: - Necesitamos otra charla.- Quizás la próxima.

translation.en: [Ugra] Once Mohammed Azharuddin was banned,
translation.es: Cuando le prohibieron jugar a Azharuddin,

translation.en: there was a kind of a… "Let's move on. Let's move ahead from here."
translation.es: había una sensación de querer avanzar.

translation.en: The CBI report had a huge impact. It changed cricket.
translation.es: El informe de la OCI tuvomucha repercusión. Cambió al críquet. DEBEN TOMARSE MEDIDAS CORRECTIVAS

translation.en: The main thing that we were able to do
translation.es: Lo principal que pudimos hacer

translation.en: was start this process of educating players.
translation.es: fue comenzar a educar a los jugadores.

translation.en: Now they are told of the dangers lurking around them.
translation.es: Ahora se les hablasobre los peligros que los acechan.

translation.en: How you can be cultivated, how you can be trapped.
translation.es: Y sobre cómo puedenmanipularlos y atraparlos.

translation.en: So they can avoid getting corrupted.
translation.es: Así pueden evitar ser corrompidos.

translation.en: [bookie on tape, in Hindi] Today anti-corruption is everywhere.
translation.es: Hoy, todo es anticorrupción. VOZ DE UN CORREDOR ANÓNIMO

translation.en: An anti-corruption team stay in the hotel with the players.
translation.es: Un equipo anticorrupciónse queda en los hoteles con los equipos.

translation.en: Even if one is able to get the players' phone numbers,
translation.es: Incluso si consiguesel número de un jugador,

translation.en: anti-corruption have an eye all over.
translation.es: los del equipo anticorrupciónestán monitoreando todo.

translation.en: But gambling is still big.
translation.es: Pero aún se apuesta.

translation.en: No one can leave it.
translation.es: Nadie puede abandonarlo.

translation.en: I have never even tried.
translation.es: Jamás lo intenté.

translation.en: This is my job.
translation.es: Es mi trabajo.

translation.en: [Ugra] When I look back at that time,
translation.es: Cuando pienso en esa época,

translation.en: it was almost like growing up.
translation.es: siento que fue como madurar.

translation.en: [chuckles] In sports journalism, it's like saying, "Wake up."
translation.es: En el periodismo deportivoes como decir: "Despierta".

translation.en: Getting a slap on your fae and saying, "Wake up. This is what real life is like."
translation.es: Como recibir una bofetada. "Despierta. Esta es la vida real".

translation.en: And so, for me, the superstars have gone away and faded,
translation.es: Para mí, las superestrellasse desvanecieron,

translation.en: but what I love is being part of the cricket community.
translation.es: pero mi pasión es ser partede la comunidad del críquet.

translation.en: Being part of the family.
translation.es: De la familia del críquet.

translation.en: It always comes back to cricket,
translation.es: Todo regresa al críquet

translation.en: because it can just set you alight with a piece of action
translation.es: porque solo este deportepuede despertar una gran emoción

translation.en: that you can't find in any other sport.
translation.es: con una pequeña acción.

translation.en: [commentator] Gone! Off stump…
translation.es: ¡Se fue! Golpeó el…

translation.en: Unbelievable performance from India.
translation.es: La India jugó de maravilla.

translation.en: [in Hindi] I will not be taking any further legal action.
translation.es: No tomaré más acciones legales.

translation.en: I'm very happy with the court's decision.
translation.es: Me alegra la decisión del tribunal.

translation.en: [in English] Uh, the case was overturned only on account of technical reasons.
translation.es: El caso fue revocado por motivos técnicos.

translation.en: We, in CBI, are absolutely certain
translation.es: En la OCI, estamos seguros

translation.en: that Mr. Mohammed Azharuddin was involved in match-fixing.
translation.es: de que el Sr. Mohammed Azharuddinparticipó en los fraudes.

translation.en: And we said it with lot of evidence available at hand.
translation.es: Y presentamos esa denunciacon evidencia que la respaldaba.

translation.en: [in Hindi] I want to do something in cricket
translation.es: Si debo elegir, me gustaría hacer algorelacionado al críquet.

translation.en: because I have played so many years.
translation.es: me gustaría hacer algorelacionado al críquet.

translation.en: I would want to share my experience
translation.es: Me gustaría compartir mi experiencia

translation.en: with the young generation of cricketers.
translation.es: con las próximas generaciones.

translation.en: [reporter] Azhar, uh…
translation.es: Azhar…

translation.en: [in Hindi] The board is ill-informed,
translation.es: La Junta está mal informada.

translation.en: and I'm disappointed by its decision,
translation.es: Me decepciona su decisión.

translation.en: which I feel is arbitrary and discriminatory.
translation.es: Siento que esarbitraria y discriminatoria.

translation.en: [in English] I do not think that M.K had any remorse as such.
translation.es: No creo que M.K sintiera culpa.

translation.en: He had made enough money
translation.es: Había ganado mucho dinero

translation.en: and, uh, that it was time for him to,
translation.es: y era el momento

translation.en: uh, shall we say, enjoy his earnings.
translation.es: de que, digamos, disfrutara de él.

translation.en: Now I can go back and sleep properly.
translation.es: Ahora puedo volver a dormir tranquilo.

translation.en: Nothing… Leave it to the government agencies.
translation.es: Déjenlo en manosde las agencias gubernamentales.

translation.en: The allegation made by Manoj Prabhakar against Kapil Dev
translation.es: La denuncia de Manoj Prabhakarcontra Kapil Dev

translation.en: were not corroborated by any kind of evidence.
translation.es: carecía de pruebas que la respalden.

translation.en: The nation's spirit would have broken if they found Kapil Dev was involved.
translation.es: DE LAS ACUSACIONES CONTRA KAPIL DEV Si la gente se enterabade su participación, se derrumbaría.

translation.en: And to that extent, I think everybody was very relieved
translation.es: Por eso creo que todos estaban aliviados

translation.en: that he's not involved.
translation.es: de que no fuera así.

translation.en: [man, in Hindi] Get the car!
translation.es: ¡Busca el auto!

translation.en: [Sawani, in English] When Mukesh Gupta revealed
translation.es: Todo cambió

translation.en: that he had dealings with Manoj Prabhakar also,
translation.es: cuando Mukesh Gupta revelóque también sobornó

translation.en: that… the entire tables turned.
translation.es: a Manoj Prabhakar.

translation.en: Perhaps he may not have been as bold in taking part in the sting operations
translation.es: Quizás no se habría animadoa investigar encubierto

translation.en: if he had ever known that he himself will be exposed.
translation.es: si hubiese sabidoque se expondría a sí mismo.

translation.en: [in Hindi] I never expected that this thing would end this way.
translation.es: No esperaba que esto terminara así.

translation.en: I was the one who originally exposed this in front of the public.
translation.es: Inicialmente, yo fuiquien expuso esto al público.

translation.en: If I was involved, I would never have started it.
translation.es: Si estuviera involucrado,no lo habría hecho.

translation.en: [Bahal] We don't know the extent, if at all,
translation.es: No sabemos en qué medida

translation.en: of Manoj's involvement in the match-fixing saga.
translation.es: Manoj estaba involucrado en los fraudes.

translation.en: We did ask him, we did confront him, but he denied everything to us.
translation.es: Lo confrontamosy se lo preguntamos, pero negó todo.

translation.en: You could say that Manoj Prabhakar
translation.es: Podrán pensar que Manoj Prabhakar

translation.en: was possibly the most gutsy or the most foolish.
translation.es: es muy valiente o muy tonto.

translation.en: You know, in that sense, to me, it was enormously gutsy.
translation.es: Creo que es muy valiente.
